EmailTemplate.name: Goose the Chamber
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Chamber Promotion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I WANT YOU BACK! IT’S AS SIMPLE AS 1…2…3
available to you now
$30 off a $200 order !!!
Step 1: Log into your business website at http://business.officedepot.com. Click on the bulletin board tab to find your coupon code. Enter this coupon code when placing your order online. Please call me if you need your login / password info.
Step 2: Call me with your order # for a…
FREE TIN OF BUTTER COOKIES !!!
Step 3: Let’s rekindle our partnership. I want you to take full advantage of the exclusive benefits we have to offer through the Office Depot Chamber of Commerce program! Give me a chance to earn your business back and let Office Depot be the “one stop shop” for all your business needs.
For your reference, your account number is {!Account.Cust_ID__c}
Warm regards,
{!User.Name} Account Manager 855-DEPOT11 x{!User.ISO_Extension__c}
